aka: Turkan Soray: The Camera Is My Love

cast.name: 图尔甘·苏莱伊 Türkan Soray

director.name: 多纳泰拉·巴格利沃 Donatella Baglivo

this_title: Turkan Soray: La cinepresa è il mio amore
trans_title: Turkan Soray: The Camera Is My Love
introduction: A portrait of the greatest Turkish actress of all time. Known as "Sultan" of the Cinema of Turkey. Born in Eyüp, Istanbul, her father of Circassian descent, while the mother was from Thessaloniki.
chinese_title: Turkan Soray: La cinepresa è il mio amore
